title: Paris Rhône Energy to Showcase Green Energy Storage Solutions at RE+ 2023 - PR Newswire
summary: The article promotes Paris Rhône Energy as a provider of sustainable energy products such as home battery storage systems and renewable energy solutions, highlighting its eco-friendly technologies and commitment to a more sustainable future.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article highlights Paris Rhône Energy's focus on sustainable energy solutions, promoting cleaner energy products and technologies that contribute to environmental sustainability goals.

green_product: TRUE. The article discusses home battery storage systems that store surplus energy, promote energy independence, and contribute to sustainability by utilizing renewable sources and eco-friendly technologies.
green_process: TRUE. The article emphasizes eco-friendly technologies, sustainable practices, and energy-efficient solutions offered by Paris Rhône Energy, aligning with green process goals of minimizing environmental impact and promoting sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 221118 - Other Electric Power Generation, 335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing, 221119 - Other Electric Power Generation, 335313 - Switchgear and Switchboard Apparatus Manufacturing
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not exhibit characteristics of greenwashing as it genuinely focuses on promoting sustainable energy products and technologies offered by Paris Rhône Energy.
